programme.desc: Pàdraig MacAoidh a' leughadh Ceàrnag. Peter Mackay reads Ceàrnag.

programme.title: Clann Na Cruinne
programme.desc: Tha Yushi ri spòrs-uisge gu math annasach far a bheil tòrr chleasan rin ionnsachadh. Yushi competes in a unique water sport that requires him to learn all sorts of tricks.

programme.title: Flix
programme.desc: Tha pàrtaidh-oidhche dol a bhith aig Flix 's a charaidean. Saoil ciamar a thèid dhaibh? Flix and his friends are going to have a sleepover. How will they get on.

programme.title: Bogaisean is Gumbalan/Bottersnikes and Gumbles
programme.desc: Tha uilebheist san stang agus tha Uilidh leis an eagal! There's a monster in the moat and Uilidh is scared.

programme.title: Stri
programme.desc: Tha Hannah a' farpais an aghaidh preasantairean CBBC ALBA ach saoil cò shoirbhicheas? Hannah competes against the CBBC ALBA presenters, but who will emerge victorious.

programme.title: A' Chùil
programme.desc: Tha Choirstaidh a' toirt sùil air neach-ealain a thug buaidh oirre, an turas seo Frida Kahlo. Choirstaidh takes a look at an artist that inspires her - this time it's Frida Kahlo.

programme.title: Gàrraidhean Mòra na h-Alba
programme.desc: Murdo Macdonald explores the beautiful Inverewe gardens in Wester Ross. Murchadh Dòmhnallach air chuairt tro ghàrradh bhrèagha Inbhir Iù air Taobh Siar Rois.

programme.title: SpeakGaelic
programme.desc: Eilidh Miller from Glasgow chats to Joy in the studio, and Calum Maclean enjoys a traditional Scottish rural holiday experience in a Highland glen.

programme.title: An Là

programme.title: Vets: Gach Creutair Beo
programme.desc: Fiadh ruadh ann an Uibhist, ùr-bhreith ann an Inbhir Ùige & cù a tha truagh ann am Farfar. A red deer in North Uist, lambs and calves in Wick and a dog in Forfar is gravely ill.

programme.title: Miann na Maighdinn-mara: Slighe gu Deas (Mermaid Tales
programme.desc: 1/3. Kate travels to Heisker, the beautiful islands west of North Uist.

programme.title: Faodail: Found

programme.title: Leonardo da Vinci - Deisciobal an Eòlais/The Disciple of Experience
programme.desc: Leonardo da Vinci grows up in a Tuscan village surrounded by nature, then moves to Florence, where the Renaissance is in full bloom.

programme.title: Alba Today

programme.title: Abadas

programme.title: AH-AH/No-No
programme.desc: Tha rudeigin a' toirt air AH-AH sreathartaich - ach dè th' ann? Something is making AH-AH sneeze, but what can it be.

programme.title: Cleasan Ataidh & Tilidh/The Adventures of Abney & Teal
programme.desc: Abney finds a whistle. When he plays it, a beautiful rainbow appears in the sky.

programme.title: Pompon Am Mathan Beag/Pompon Little Bear
programme.desc: 22/39. Tha Pompon a' sealltainn a sgilean dhraoidheachd dha phàrantan 's iad uile anns a' choille. Pompon shows his parents magician skills while they are all in the woods.

programme.title: Stòiridh

programme.title: Naidheachdan Neònach CBBC ALBA
programme.desc: Calum Macdonald introduces his personal highlights from the craziest news show on BBC ALBA.

programme.title: An Saoghal Droil aig Pol Ploc/The Rubbish World of Dave Spud
programme.desc: The people of Grimsby believe the Twins are wise lifestyle gurus, able to predict what everyone wants before they know it themselves.

programme.title: An Saoghal Droil aig Pol Ploc/The Rubbish World of Dave Spud
programme.desc: Dave and his friends are given a lesson in responsibility when their school assigns them an animal each to look after overnight.

programme.title: Mach à Seo!

programme.title: SpeakGaelic
programme.desc: June Graham drops in on Joy in the studio, while Calum Maclean investigates the environmental properties of the peatland of Strath Halladale in northern Scotland.

programme.title: An Là

programme.title: Port an t-Òib

programme.title: Leonardo da Vinci - Deisciobal an Eòlais/The Disciple of Experience

programme.desc: Cuirm le Julie Fowlis & còisir Binneas aig Kelvingrove. Bho Celtic Connections 2024. A performance by Julie Fowlis & Binneas at Kelvingrove. From Celtic Connections 2024.

programme.title: Cocain is na Klondykers

programme.title: Earth's Natural Wonders
programme.desc: Series combining photography and human drama as it reveals 12 remarkable places, uncovering the stories of people fighting to survive in earth's natural wonders.

programme.title: The Good Life
programme.desc: Barbara gets Margo out of a fix when a speaker at Margo's society lets her down. Her talk about self-sufficiency is so successful, she finds herself in great demand.

programme.title: Yes Minister
programme.desc: Jim Hacker supports the sale of an art gallery, which will help fund his ailing local football club. Sir Humphrey is horrified.

programme.title: Africa's Lion Kings: Natural World
programme.desc: A pride of lions has rewritten the rules - they have learnt to take down elephants.

programme.title: Great Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Palin travels through Northern Ireland and Ireland and finds out more about his Irish ancestors, experiences the 'peace train' from Belfast to Dublin and visits Cork.

programme.title: Michael Palin: The Art of Travel
programme.desc: Travelogue. Michael Palin takes his golf clubs to St Andrews on a train journey up the 'drier side of Britain', celebrating a bygone age of rail travel.

programme.title: Michael Palin - Comic Roots
programme.desc: Michael Palin looks back in languor at his rise to stardom with the help of his mum, his old geography teacher, Spike Milligan, Terry Jones, the boy next door and DP Gumby.

programme.title: Attica: America's Bloodiest Prison Uprising - Storyville
programme.desc: Documentary about the violent prison riot that gripped America in 1971. Contains very strong language and graphic violent scenes.

programme.title: Dan Cruickshank and the Family That Built Gothic Britain
programme.desc: How the great icons of British Gothic architecture were all created by one family.

programme.title: Great Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Palin travels through Northern Ireland and Ireland and finds out more about his Irish ancestors, experiences the 'peace train' from Belfast to Dublin and visits Cork.

programme.title: The Return of Flying Scotsman
programme.desc: Film following the Flying Scotsman, the world's most famous steam engine, as it returns to the tracks following a ten-year restoration which cost more than £4 million.

programme.title: Flying Scotsman from the Footplate
programme.desc: The view from the driving seat as Flying Scotsman travels the Severn Valley Railway. Cab cameras and microphones capture all the action.

programme.title: Ian Hislop Goes off the Rails

programme.title: Waris Hussein Remembers... The Clothes in the Wardrobe

programme.title: The Clothes in the Wardrobe - Screen Two
programme.desc: Nineteen-year-old Margaret is about to marry a dull middle-aged man. Can anyone help her? Contains some scenes of a sexual nature.

programme.title: Crime and Punishment: The Story of Corporal Punishment
programme.desc: Documentary that lifts the veil on the taboo that is corporal punishment. Deals with adult themes.

programme.desc: SVP's up at midnight and bringing his unique perspective on games people play to "SportsCenter" viewers. programme.title: NFL Matchup
programme.desc: An NFL Films production, "NFL Matchup" is definitely a show for football junkies. Unlike traditional football preview programs, this one gives fans an in-depth look at some of Sunday's games by breaking down the strategy and tactics - the Xs and Os - through the exclusive use of team-supplied footage. That type of film study is a forte of former NFL player and executive Louis Riddick and NFL Films producer Greg Cosell, whose work is featured here alongside host Sal Paolantonio.

programme.title: American Monster
programme.desc: A Utah family is torn apart after a disgruntled ex-husband, unable to move on, comes looking for revenge on his former wife after she gets remarried.

programme.title: The Murder Tapes
programme.desc: The town of Fort Smith, Arkansas, is left reeling when a retired schoolteacher is found bludgeoned to death, struck with a hammer no fewer than 36 times.

programme.title: Judge Rinder's Crime Stories
programme.desc: A woman's life hangs in the balance after she escapes a controlling relationship. Plus, a family are left devastated as a result of dangerous driving.

programme.title: Murder On CCTV

programme.title: Evil Lives Here: Shadows Of Death

programme.title: Live NFL
programme.desc: Arizona Cardinals v Seattle Seahawks (Kick-off 1.15am). Coverage of the week four match at State Farm Stadium in Glendale. These two sides met twice last season with the Seahawks coming out on top on both occasions. They met in Seattle at the end of November with the West Coast side winning 16-6 before they faced up again two weeks later at this venue, with the Cardinals losing 30-18 in that meeting.

programme.title: Madeleine McCann: Searching for the Prime Suspect
programme.desc: Eighteen years after vanishing from a holiday apartment in Praia da Luz, Portugal, the mystery of Madeleine McCann's disappearance remains unsolved. German prosecutors recently confirmed that Christian Brueckner, the man they've long believed responsible, is set to be released from prison with no charges imminent in relation to Madeleine's abduction and suspected murder. Criminologist Dr Graham Hill, a former senior Met detective who was in Portugal during the early stages of the investigation, returns to Praia da Luz. He examines the case against the man who remains the prime suspect, and who has consistently denied any involvement in Madeleine's disappearance.

programme.title: Hello Kitty: Super Style!

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake: Berry in...

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings

programme.title: Gigantosaurus

programme.title: Gigantosaurus

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake: Berry in...

programme.desc: The Cavaliers (2-1, 0-0) kick off their ACC slate for 2025 by meeting the Cardinal (1-2, 1-0) for the first time. Stanford began its league schedule with a 30-20 home win over Boston College on Sept. 13 after an 0-2 start on the road.

programme.title: **Visually Signed** The Adventures of Paddington
programme.desc: Mr Brown is taking the kids to the circus tonight but where are the tickets? Paddington and the children must retrace his steps to find them. (VS).

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and George love jumping in muddy puddles, even when it's raining - but when George takes off his rain hat, he catches a cold.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and her family are at the school fete where the top prize in the raffle is a trip in a hot air balloon.

programme.title: Odo
programme.desc: Odo and Doodle build a bug hotel for a bunch of homeless beetles, but Louie and Bud don't like the 'creepy crawlies' at all.

programme.title: Tweedy & Fluff
programme.desc: Tweedy discovers the limits of little Fluff's imagination when he tries to pretend they're at sea on a boat. Fluff can only ever be a Fluff, doing Fluff things.

programme.title: Treehouse
programme.desc: While drumming in the treehouse, Squiggle spots a butterfly, but loud noises scare it away. To see it again, they must learn to be very quiet. Shhh.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends: All Engines Go!
programme.desc: Kana wants to speed fast enough to turn her electric crackle a bright red. The engines help build a long, straight express track but a duck pond blocks the only viable path.

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: The self-styled 'wild men of Pontypandy' need rescuing from a fox den when they try to retrieve a hat.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Grandpa Pig and Grandad Dog take Peppa, George and Danny bowling. Peppa, George and Grandpa Pig have never been before.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: Rubble & Crew are on the job to save Builder Cove after a rainstorm threatens to flood the town.

programme.title: Pip and Posy
programme.desc: Pip and Posy find a ladybird and name it Spotty Dotty. Posy wants to keep it in her bottle, but is that really the best place for a living creature.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington
programme.desc: Paddington wants to thank Mrs Bird for everything she does for him, so he decides he wants to make a special marmalade sponge cake.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Everyone is getting ready for Mr Bull and Mrs Cow's wedding, going to the jewellers to get rings, to the dress makers to get a wedding dress... and to sort the wedding cake.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: With the building work complete, it's time to decorate! Peppa and George have fun choosing how to decorate their new attic bedrooms. It's dinosaurs for George, but what will Peppa pick.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: When a storm keeps the Rexes at home, they must think of a game to pass the time.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Daring Danny X becomes Mayor Humdinger's assistant and builds a theme park. A jealous Humdinger sabotages the rides.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: After Chickaletta accidentally takes flight on a toy airplane, it's up to the PAW Patrol to rescue her.

programme.title: Milo
programme.desc: Milo and his pals have to get creative when left in charge of florists Blossoms and Blooms.

programme.title: Ben and Holly's Little Kingdom
programme.desc: Holly gets frustrated when Ben uses his elf skills to win all their games, then Ben becomes annoyed when Holly gets her own back.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Mummy and Daddy Pig get stuck behind Mrs Badger's tractor on the way to her farm, where Peppa and George learn about how useful tractors can be, even if they aren't very fast.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa's pet goldfish Goldie is having a birthday party with an undersea theme.

programme.title: Milkshake! Story Den
programme.desc: Join David for a story about Sitara and her special gift - her name. But as Sitara grows, some people jumble up her name until it's not her name anymore.

programme.title: Home and Away
programme.desc: Jo shows Tane what he's missing. Mackenzie and Levi brace for a difficult conversation.

programme.title: Deadly Nightmare In Paradise

programme.title: All Creatures Great and Small
programme.desc: Tristan and Carmody can't see eye to eye, but a quest to Pumphrey Manor might just bring them together. Helen tries to support James when unresolved feelings resurface.

programme.title: 5 News at 5

programme.title: Jersey and Guernsey
programme.desc: An 18th century replica sailing ship arrives at St Helier's Port, brand new chocolate creations are showcased, plus a spot of seaweed foraging on Guernsey.

programme.title: Puppy School for Guide Dogs
programme.desc: At puppy school, trainee guide dog Milton tries to nail recall and use a pedestrian crossing. Hester, 16, prepares for the arrival of her new Guide Dog Pickle. Will they be a good fit.

programme.title: Street Cops: Catching the Yobs
programme.desc: The police neighbourhood teams get to grips with criminals holed up in a smart suburban semi, a firearm at a local charity and a drug dealer making a run for it.

programme.title: Coastguard SOS: Search & Rescue
programme.desc: A helicopter is dispatched to save a skipper's life when winds threaten to push a yacht in to a harbour wall. And a surveillance team investigate worrying signs of pollution.

programme.title: Catching Britain's Street Thieves
programme.desc: With street crime sweeping Britain, an ex-police detective helps the public to get justice, by meeting victims and tracking down and confronting brazen criminals.

programme.title: Fare Dodgers: At War with the Law
programme.desc: Investigators trail a man they believe has racked up nearly £2,500 in unpaid fares by fraudulently making contactless payments with his bank card.

programme.title: Traffic Cops: Pursuit Squad One
programme.desc: Near Harrogate, cop Paddy chases a driver seen using his phone, leading to a dangerous high-speed pursuit. On the A1, cop Paul races to intercept a suspected fraudster.

programme.title: Entertainment News on 5
programme.desc: The latest celebrity news round-up and gossip.

programme.title: PlayOJO Live Casino Show
programme.desc: Red or black? Odds or evens? Whichever way you play, get that OJO feeling with two hours of exciting live roulette every single night! Take us for a spin and feel the fun at playojo.com.

programme.title: The Omaze Dream House: Are You Missing Out

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: ...Part 2. Ross finds Marcel on the set of a new movie, where Chandler bumps into a former schoolmate. Meanwhile, Rachel and Monica compete for the affections of Jean-Claude Van Damme.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Monica struggles to tell her parents she is unemployed. Joey gives Chandler a hideous bracelet. The gang watch a video from Monica and Rachel's prom.

programme.desc: Shondie and David work a busy night shift, and collie dog Lassie receives course of acupuncture. (VS).

programme.desc: Pip and Posy make Zac a mermaid's tail made out of sand, adding pebble and leaf decorations. When Posy's leaves go missing, she accuses Pip of taking them. (VS).

programme.desc: The Browns are having their annual summer games. Will Paddington be good at any of them? (VS).

programme.title: Tweedy & Fluff

programme.desc: When Thomas and Kana ignore the needs of their engines, they end up exhausted and unable to complete their deliveries.

programme.title: Pip and Posy
programme.desc: Pip and Posy are drawing ducklings, but an accident leaves Pip's yellow creation looking green. Will it be fun to try some different colours.

programme.title: Peppa Pig

programme.title: Cúla 4
programme.desc: Sit back and be entertained with all your favourite shows, Animal Fanpedia, SpongeBob Squarepants, Pat The Dog, Adventure Time, Clarence, Sadie Sparks, Mo Shaol Do Shaol, Na hInnealtóirí and so much more.

programme.title: Bréidín and Clúmh
programme.desc: Tweedy makes a toy for Fluff but is sad when he gets upstaged by a noisy fly!

programme.title: CoComelon: It's Cody Time
programme.desc: Cody is on his way to school and wants to sing a song.

programme.title: Cocomelon: JJ's Animal Time
programme.desc: JJ, Boba and Wally can't wait to open a mysterious treasure chest on their pirate ship.

programme.title: Rita & Crogall
programme.desc: Rita opens Muiris' gift on her way to his birthday party, and she and Crocodile play with it.

programme.title: Bíp Bíp Cory Carson
programme.desc: Cory is ecstatic to finally join the library. However, the excitement is short-lived when Cory realises that he has lost a book.

programme.title: Garáiste Gecko
programme.desc: The Blue Mechanic must save Eric the Excavator. Gecko gets stuck in a tunnel.

programme.title: Abby's Amazing Adventures
programme.desc: Abby and Rudy are going to the kite festival today.

programme.title: Pip and Posy
programme.desc: Pip and Posy try to stay up late so they can have a midnight snack with each other.

programme.title: Olobob Top
programme.desc: The Olobobs invent a new ball game but can't agree on the rules. When Lemon accidentally bursts the ball, they create Burby, and learn that rules can be invented too!

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: There's a new octopus-girl in the city, who wants to be friends with the PJ Masks, but her actions tell a different story. Octobella ruins Gekko's hero reputation.

programme.title: Wussywat the Clumsy Cat
programme.desc: Wussywat discovers compost and how to make it. Wussywat helps Ortus put compost on his cabbage seedlings but when it runs out, it's up to Wussywat to see if he can find some more. Maybe Ird can help? No, she's just eaten loads of apples and is too full to fly. How about Oggy, who is playing in the grass cuttings?

programme.title: Zou
programme.desc: Zou thinks he'd like to be a lifeguard but it doesn't turn out to be as interesting as he hoped, until he saves a fish from Zak's sandcastle.

programme.title: DinoCity
programme.desc: Today, Ricky wants to fly like the pterodactyls.

programme.title: Vegesaurs
programme.desc: The baby Pea-Rexes love to slide down the necks of giant Broccolisauruses, except for Split, who is terrified and has to learn to overcome his fears.

programme.title: Dot
programme.desc: Dot and the group enter themselves into the Catnova music video contest, so they must find a way to make themselves stand out from the crowd.

programme.title: Ella Bella Bingo
programme.desc: Ella and her friends want to take photographs of butterflies to see who gets the best picture.

programme.title: Cúla 4
programme.desc: Sit back and be entertained with all your favourite shows, Animal Fanpedia, SpongeBob Squarepants, Pat The Dog, Adventure Time, Clarence, Sadie Sparks, Mo Shaol Do Shaol, Na hInnealtóirí and so much more.

programme.title: Charlie agus Lola
programme.desc: It's the school play and Lola is determined to be the Sun. She knows the part will be hers because yellow is her favourite colour. She is hugely disappointed when she finds out that she is a boring brown autumn leaf.

programme.title: Baile Beag Draíochtúil Pinocchio
programme.desc: Pinocchio and Buaiceasaín are challenged to get an owl's feather.

programme.title: Pat An Madra
programme.desc: Lola and Victor play Maxi Golf.

programme.title: Angelo Rules
programme.desc: Angelo & Sherwood want to become brown belts in karate.

programme.title: Dónall Dána
programme.desc: Horrid Henry's Halloween plans are foiled when he is sent to his room and forbidden to leave the house, thanks to his perfect brother, but all is not lost as he finds some inventive ways to enjoy a perfectly sweet Halloween.

programme.title: Cúla 4
programme.desc: Sit back and be entertained with all your favourite shows, Animal Fanpedia, SpongeBob Squarepants, Pat The Dog, Adventure Time, Clarence, Sadie Sparks, Mo Shaol Do Shaol, Na hInnealtóirí and so much more.

programme.title: Super Simple Amhráin
programme.desc: A fun song about the mountains.

programme.title: Blocuimhreacha
programme.desc: PI One is wondering where her next case will come from when a square silhouette appears at the door.

programme.title: Blocdhathanna
programme.desc: Finding out that there are lots of different shades of Grey.

programme.title: Firicí Fíochmhara
programme.desc: Zookeeper John introduces kids to the charming world of penguins. As he meticulously prepares a fish meal for the penguins, he educates them with engaging facts about these captivating creatures.

programme.title: Scéal an Lae
programme.desc: Today Maria Schaeler is reading Micí Moncaí.

programme.title: Pip and Posy
programme.desc: Pip finds himself growing flustered at his funny joke being re-told incorrectly.

programme.title: Saol Faoi Shráid
programme.desc: It's April Fool's Day and Ribín and Glibín want to play a trick on their friends. Perhaps she plays the trick once too often. Ribín and Glibín's friends above ground are also busy tricking each other for April Fool's Day.

programme.title: Bígí Ag Ceol
programme.desc: Every episode focuses on a new song written in Irish for children. In this episode we write a song about our day at school.

programme.title: Curious George
programme.desc: When a blizzard covers the country house in snow, George has fun skiing, snowshoeing and sledding; George starts work at a grocery store.

programme.title: Nuair A Bheidh Mé Mór
programme.desc: Muireann imagines her life as a musician when she grows up, with the help of the Job Fairy. She then practices the skills that she will need in order to to play music at a professional level.

programme.title: Zou
programme.desc: Nanna's favourite TV programme has been replaced by a less interesting show. Zou decides to cheer Nanna up by recreating the show in his living room.

programme.title: Dee Dee
programme.desc: The Autumn celebration is upon us. DeeDee has a new sewing machine and the Mayor has asked her to make him a grand green and gold sash. Luciano wants a new cape and MewMew wants a new waistcoat.

programme.title: Is Mise
programme.desc: Today, Cian will be visiting Crag Cave in Co. Kerry.

programme.title: Ainmhithe Craiceáilte
programme.desc: A monkey does impressions, a pair of curious bears investigate a tree and there is a skateboarding pooch.

programme.title: Comhrá
programme.desc: A native of Limerick, Gabriel Rosenstock first achieved prominence as one of a new generation of Irish-language poets who studied in University College Cork in the early 1970s.

programme.title: The Wonder Years
programme.desc: Kevin (Fred Savage) is too embarrassed for words when his mother (Alley Mills) takes a job at school.

programme.title: Geantraí
programme.desc: Breandán Ó Beaglaoich presents a lively traditional music session featuring Gerry O'Connor, Ned Kelly, Tom Keenan, Feargal O'Neill, Jimmy O'Brien-Moran, Ann Mulqueen, Ódharnait Ní Chéilleachair, and Sorcha Ní Chéilleachair.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Rose's cousin (Casey Sander) falls madly in love with Blanche.

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote

programme.title: Cat A' Hata
programme.desc: Swinging from a rope isn't easy for Sally and Nick. Good thing the Cat knows the king of swing - Charlie the chimpanzee! programme.title: Cat A' Hata

programme.title: Cat A' Hata

programme.title: Cat A' Hata

programme.title: Cat A' Hata
